inclusion.criterion: Child must meet the DSM-IV criteria for AD or PDD NOS as determined via a parent interview on the ADI-R and on child observation via the ADOS, or DD.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Child must have categorical and dimensional evidence of clinically significant ADHD symptoms in multiple settings that have been present for at least six months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Child with prior failed treatment with an adequate trial of methylphenidate;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current history of physical, sexual, or emotional abuse;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old man with tinea pedis infection. He has no underlying diseases and smokes 15 cigarettes per day.
